channel.title: Hybrid PVP v3 drops help
channel.description: Ok.. I recently fixed my corp and my tormented demons so that they could be attacked... Well after i saved and compiled in npcdrops.tsm I got this error on the run.bat: [code=java]#Corp 8133:80 995:30000 565:60 554:60 1079:1 1093:1 1127:1 1432:1 1333:1 1185:1 2366:1 1249:1 13734:1 13736:1 13738:1 13740:1 13742:1 13744:1 13746:1 13748:1 13750:1 13752:1[/code] it said 8133 outofbounds exception and td's simply dont drop, and whenever the drops for the corp are like that, no other npcs drop anything, what to do?

item.title: Hybrid PVP v3 drops help
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

This should be how its set up:

Where the #### are put your monster id
Where the **** are put your item drop
Where it says 1-1, that is how many they drop 1 to 1 , which is one item
Where it says 30:100, that is how many it drops per 100
20:100 would be 20 per 100.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid PVP v3 drops help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Did all that, when i run the server, got no errors, from the run.bat, when i go kill corp, it doesnt drop anything. Same with my Tormented Demons maybe im screwed?

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid PVP v3 drops help
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Yeah like he said, i usually add 2 tabs between each items id just encase.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybrid PVP v3 drops help
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

you have an item thats out of bounds, or not in your source. either that or you have a space where you’re supposed to have a tab.

Read full topic

item.description:

Ok… I recently fixed my corp and my tormented demons so that they could be attacked… Well after i saved and compiled in npcdrops.tsm
